programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide
programme.desc: Watch Africa's Cape Coast that goes from the frigid waters of Cape Point to the sub-tropic seas of Kwazulu-Natal.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water
programme.desc: The Zambezi is one of Africa's most influential rivers. It supports some of the continent's most spectacular wildlife. However, the Zambezi's long and winding journey destroys, as well as creates.

programme.title: Mr Morgan's Last Love
programme.desc: He's a widower in Paris who speaks no French. She's a dance instructor less than half his age. Can they become a family, or will his estranged adult children halt the friendship?

programme.title: The Sentinel

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye

programme.desc: Becky and Jake use Stormcloud to set up a stud on Drovers, going into partnership with Claire and Tess for the use of their land and reputation. Claire finds it hard not to be involved, a horse stud has long been her dream.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: ALEX and NICK come to the rescue of an attractive woman ELLIE, when her car breaks down on a country road. Almost instantly theyre pitched into a competition to win her, and the lead shifts from one to the other as each shines with his own charm.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Island Hopper

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back Behind Bars

programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whiteout conditions critically delay Pemberton SARs search for a lost snowmobiler. And later, surviving an avalanche!

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler Search and Rescue turns a missing out of bounds snowboarder into a crusader of mountain safety.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland and Nelson Search and Rescue risk avalanche threats to recover a ski fatality in the backcountry.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson Search and Rescue rings in the New Year with three back-to-back missions.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: White water rescue rookies in Nelson BC get a taste of reality when their swift-water training course becomes an actual mission, one they will never forget.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams go deep for a missing subject in the Upana cave system on Vancouver Island.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her hot girl summer. Not only that, but he doesnt trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isnt ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that arent there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhans bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacobys mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if hes straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing womens underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: My Money
programme.desc: Barbara says Alicia is a cheater and a thief. Barbara's seen Alicias text messages from men and asserts she is verbally abusive and financially irresponsible. Alicia says Barbara is controlling, a liar, selfish and never committed to their marriage.

programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mama's Boys
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.desc: Kevin's burgeoning career as a child actor has a negative fallout when a potential big break goes to his head. Ted Lange guest stars.

programme.desc: Nick secretly plans a surprise for Suzanne to help her overcome a traumatic childhood experience.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Lindsey Goes Vegan Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey decides to take on a vegan diet and lifestyle, but she may have ulterior motives in doing so.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Mr. Almost Episode
programme.desc: Nick runs into an old college friend, who convinces him to bring Deion Sanders aboard his energy drink business with humiliating consequences.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Play Date Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Kevin Gets a Commercial Episode
programme.desc: Kevin's burgeoning career as a child actor has a negative fallout when a potential big break goes to his head. Ted Lange guest stars.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.desc: Ryan brings PRS to his hometown of Sumter, SC to investigate a chilling case where a young boy was tragically shot and killed on a front doorstep while trick-or-treating on Halloween.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Return of the Dead: Glove II

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Ranch

programme.title: Leopard Inn Pt 1

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Lindsey Vonn
programme.desc: Bear and Olympic gold medallist Lindsey Vonn take a speedboat trip, then swim to shore and make their way along a rugged coastline; after traversing a deep chasm, they collect a dinner of sea urchins.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Ben Stiller

programme.desc: Bear and Joseph Gordon-Levitt navigate Kenya's unyielding terrain; Joseph and Bear navigate a perilous rappel, milk a camel for hydration, ascend a massive rock dome and battle a crocodile for dinner; Joseph talks about his family and rise to fame.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Shaquille O'Neal

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Uzo Aduba

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Roger Federer
programme.desc: Bear takes one of the best athletes of all time, Roger Federer, on a daring adventure through the Swiss Alps as they attempt to navigate the tough terrain. They descend a frozen waterfall and use tennis rackets as snowshoes.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Wetland Animals
programme.desc: Wetland Animals dives into the swamps, rivers, and flood plains of the Everglades, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Kakadu National Park in Australia, and the Amazon to see deadly crocodiles, piranhas, hippopotamus, flamingo, manatee, and platypus.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Forest Animals
programme.desc: Forest Animals gets up close with bears, koalas, moose, wolves, weaver ants, and Tasmanian Devils. This episode roves dark forests floors and soars above vast canopies of green in America, China, Laos, and Australia.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure thats designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: Arthur: Rhyme For Your Life/For Whom The Bell Tolls
programme.desc: While struggling to write a poem for his mom, Binky falls asleep and gets trapped in Verseberg--where it's a crime not to rhyme! And D.W. has lost her voice! For Arthur it's a dream come true--until Mom asks Arthur to take care of D.W.

programme.title: Arthur: The Hallway Minotaur/Ladonna's Like List
programme.desc: Attention Lakewood Elementary! There's a new sheriffer--hallway monitor-in town, and his name is George Lundgren. Ladonna Compson is friendly, funny, and full of personality. Everyone likes her! At least, that's what she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Unravels/All the Rage
programme.desc: Grandma Thora teaches Arthur to knit and he's really into this new hobby. Buthe's a kid! And a boy! Knitting is a grandma thing, right? And, Muffy wants to rock the fashion world, but creating a fad is a lot harder than it looks.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Toy Trouble/Spar for the Course
programme.desc: It's a race to the toy store after Arthur realizes he may have given away his chance at 2 million dollars! Unless Muffy, Buster, and Binky can comprise, they'll be stuck with a boring windmill at the new 18th hole at the mini golf course.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Almost Boring Day/The Half-Baked Sale
programme.desc: It's raining and boy is it BORING! But then, in Grandma Thora's attic, Arthur and D.W. discover some really FASCINATING stuff about their parents. Next, Grandma Thora is helping to organize a bake sale, but her goodies arent very good.

programme.title: Arthur: Desk Wars/Desperately Seeking Stanley
programme.desc: When Mr. Ratburn moves Brain and Arthur away from their usual desks, it sets off a chain reaction resulting in the most explosive desk war in third grade history! And, Arthur is 8-years old nowdoes he still need his teddy bear?

programme.title: Arthur: Fern's Flights of Fancy/Cereal
programme.desc: Will Fern give up her dreams of being a writer just because of one silly rejection? Buster tells the story of a missing cereal box on his all-new podcast. Will he be able to find the thief--and in the process--the truth?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Read: Super Saver!/Tibbles to the Rescue!
programme.desc: Business is slow for Mr. and Mrs. Read, and Arthur is concerned. Can he find ways to keep his family in the green? When D.W. saves Tommy and Timmy from a nasty fall, they decide to repay the favorwhether D.W. likes it or not.

programme.title: Arthur: What Scared Sue Ellen?/Clarissa Is Cracked
programme.desc: Sue Ellen's not afraid of much, but when she encounters a really creepy howling noise in the woods, she's scared for real. Then, Grandma Thora has a lot of fun stuff, especially her porcelain doll, Clarissa.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: By the end of the First World War the RAF had bombers that could fly to Berlin and back. For the first time in a thousand years British civilians found themselves under direct attack - by Zeppelin airships and Gotha bombers.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: By the end of the war the RAF had aircraft that could escort bombers to targets deep inside Germany and back. With the Gloster Meteor, the RAF had also entered the Jet Age. Aircraft like the Hawker Hunter and F-86 Sabre took the RAF supersonic.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The 1920s and 30s were uncertain times for the RAF as well as all other armed services. With peace came cuts in spending on new aircraft development.

programme.title: RAF: The Royal Air Force: Battle for the Skies
programme.desc: The series begins before WWI when military commanders struggled to understand what uses aviation might have. The Wright Brothers had been the first to fly a powered aircraft in controlled flight in 1903, but even by 1914 aircraft were still underpowered.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters: Franz Stangl & Gustav Wagner
programme.desc: Nazi Hunters examines how Nazi hunter Simon Wiesenthal tracked down fugitive war criminal Franz Stangl in Brazil. Stangl was responsible for the murder of over 800,000 people.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Fans of popular YouTube star Andrea Russett call on Nev and Max to help catch a potential stalker who is impersonating Andrea's family online. What the guys uncover will shock even them. (S5, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Solana & Elijah
programme.desc: Solana is in a relationship with Danny but can't stop thinking about her online love Elijah. His photos were used in so many profiles that she has to know is this the real Elijah?

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Paris enlists Nev and Max to help her figure out who has been catfishing her for the past four years. But as the guys investigate, they make a shocking discovery. (S5, ep11)

programme.title: The City: Mingling with the Commoners
programme.desc: Olivia invites Jay's band to perform at one of her charity events but her plan backfires when the band is disrespected on-stage, leaving Whitney and Olivia at odds. (s1, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special, but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment, their relationship is put to the test. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: Love is Not a Maybe Thing
programme.desc: Heidi decides she's had enough drama with Jordan. When she turns to the girls for advice, she realises what she has to do. And are Lauren and Jason's fighting days finally behind them? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The Hills: Timing is Everything
programme.desc: Lauren's work at LA Fashion Week brings a career opportunity of a lifetime, but she's torn between her job and Jason. Whitney leaves LA; Heidi and Audrina are single in the city. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The Hills: Out With The Old
programme.desc: After a rocky summer with her boyfriend Jason, Lauren decides to break it off and returns to work to face her boss. Heidi finds herself in trouble with a guy both she and Audrina are dating. (S2, ep1)

programme.title: The City: Unexpected Roommates
programme.desc: Adam kicks Jay out of his apartment so Allie can move in &amp; Jay asks Whitney if he can live with her. Erin's plan to juggle two guys backfires &amp; leaves her alone on New Year's Eve. (S1, ep9)

programme.title: The City: The Past Catches Up
programme.desc: When the gang goes to Miami for the weekend, Jay runs into his ex-girlfriend Danielle and Whitney wonders if the rumours about them might be true after all. (S1, ep10)

programme.title: The City: Fool Me Twice, Shame On Me
programme.desc: Whitney's crushed to learn that Jay's mysterious night out was spent with his ex-girlfriend, Danielle. Olivia steals the credit from Whitney when they style an ELLE cover shoot! (S1, ep11)

programme.title: The City: I'm Sorry Whit
programme.desc: When Jay finds out he's going on tour, Whitney isn't willing to give up on the relationship, but when Jay doesn't give her a choice their relationship ends in a tearful goodbye. (S1, ep12)

programme.title: The City: Finale
programme.desc: Fresh from a breakup with Jay, Whitney questions if she made the right decision leaving LA. An opportunity opens up at work, but Olivia is after the same position. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Soldier's Wife
programme.desc: A soldier claims the fatal shot he fired into the back of his young wife's head was an accident, but prosecutors say he did it intentionally in a fit of jealousy.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A New York dentist denies killing his lover's husband -- who was also his best friend.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Elizabeth Welsh's husband, Patrick, left her and their two sons what appeared to be a suicide note and disappeared. After investigating the situation, Elizabeth discovered that Patrick is still alive, living in Texas.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Mother Accused
programme.desc: This report investigates alleged incidents of Shaken Baby Syndrome, focusing on accusations involving Paulette and Kelly Welch, a Mormon couple living in Idaho Falls, Idaho, whose adopted son Stockton died on May 1, 1999 following a fall in their home.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fight For The Truth
programme.desc: 17-year-old Marty Tankleff was convicted of murdering his adoptive parents in their home. Marty initially confessed, but quickly recanted. He has fought for years for his innocence, as new witnesses have surfaced who could potentially exonerate him.

programme.title: 48 Hours: My Father's Killer
programme.desc: James Bernard Campbell entered SueZann Bosler's home, murdered her father and almost killed her. 48 HOURS follows SueZann as she returns to the crime scene and then focuses on her unusual crusade for justice.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: When Jon is set-up for humiliation by a dating game TV show, Garfield comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Penelope falls for a hipper cat until Garfield learns to rock and roll.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Pros and Cons/Rooster Revenge/Lights! Camera! Garfield!
programme.desc: Garfield sets out to con a con./After an especially cruel trick Orson decides to get even with Roy./Garfield is spotted by famed film director Fredericko Fettucini.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Rip Van Kitty/Grabbity/The Big Catnap
programme.desc: Garfield sleeps for twenty years and awakens to a strange future./Roy convinces Wade that the "law of gravity" has been repealed./The arrival of homemade cookies signal a "cat and mouse" game.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Cabin Fever/U.S. Acres: Return of Power Pig/Fair Exchange
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie are snowbound in a cabin with no food./A monster circulates around the farm, Orson dons his "Power Pig" togs./Garfield dreams he changes places with Jon.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: While playing hide and seek, Odie gets found by a rich girl who wants a puppy.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Legend of Cactus Jupiter/U.S Acres: Birthday Boy Roy/Jukebox Jon
programme.desc: Garfield dreams of being pioneers in outer space./Roy gets a watch for his birthday./Jon's attempt to break a habit by listening to a record in his sleep.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Attention-Getting Garfield/Swine Trek/Dog Food
programme.desc: Floyd, the mouse, shows Garfield how to get noticed./Orson dreams he is captain of a starship./Garfield tells Odie how they make dog food.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Mail Animal/Peanut-Brained Rooster/Mummy Dearest
programme.desc: Garfield gets their mailman fired./Roy can't get enough of the latest crop of peanuts./Garfield dreams he's in ancient Egypt.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Mr. Swindler returns and gets Jon to sell the house for $1. Wades forgetful cousin arrives.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Crack-Up
programme.desc: Jim Phelps poses as a master chess champion to trap a criminal with a near-genius mentality and his mysterious boss.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Puppet
programme.desc: Roddy McDowall guest stars as Leo Ostro, a brilliant crime syndicate boss who becomes the target of the IMF when he launches a mysterious one-hundred-million-dollar scheme.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Incarnate
programme.desc: Kim Hunter guest stars as Hannah O'Connel a brilliant but superstitious criminal who escapes to a Caribbean country and is drawn into a voodoo ceremony by the IMF to locate a cache of stolen gold she has hidden away.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Boomerang
programme.desc: Laraine Stephens guest stars as the beautiful wife of a crime syndicate boss who becomes the target of both the underworld and the Impossible Missions Force when she has her husband killed and steals his records of the syndicate's operations.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Question
programme.desc: Elizabeth Ashley guest stars as a beautiful IMF agent who becomes the key to determining if enemy agent Nicholai Varsi is telling the truth when he claims he's defecting to the United States.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: On Again, Off Again
programme.desc: Barney, Baby Bop and the kids learn all about "on" and "off" by playing games together.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: This Way In, This Way Out!
programme.desc: Angela is in the park to release her turtle after observing him with her classmates in school. Barney and the children discuss the meaning of in and out after observing the turtle going in and out of his shell.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Splish! Splash!
programme.desc: A "too hot" afternoon becomes a "totally cool" day when Barney introduces his friends to the wonders of water.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Play Piano With Me!
programme.desc: The children learn all about the piano when they play games, listen to real pianos and even play a little themselves.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jerry & Karla
programme.desc: Jerry needs help meeting his first love Karla. Karla claims to have already met Jerry but refuses to talk to him on the phone. Can Oobah and Nella find out if Karla is who she says she is? (S2, ep1)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Expert Witness
programme.desc: This report focuses on the use of expert witnesses in criminal trials and the problems that arise when their testimony is inaccurate or completely false.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Chasing the Barefoot Bandit
programme.desc: A report on Colton Harris-Moore, also known as the Barefoot Bandit, because of his habit of committing crimes barefoot and leaving chalk outlines of his feet; and whose exploits included stealing planes, guns, yachts, and escaping to foreign countries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Soldier's Wife
programme.desc: A soldier claims the fatal shot he fired into the back of his young wife's head was an accident, but prosecutors say he did it intentionally in a fit of jealousy.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A report on the hunt for a serial killer suspected of murdering three young women from Los Angeles, California to Chicago, Illinois.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A missing woman is found dead in Texas; interviews with her family, friends, investigators, and boyfriend.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Cop Behind Bars
programme.desc: Patrick Bradford, was convicted of stabbing his mistress to death. Determined to win his acquittal, Deborah Nolan, a close friend, and staunch supporter of Bradfords, quit her teaching job and went to law school to take on his defense.
